item.title: Freeman's Mind Episode 0
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
Projects tend to fail when there’s no work getting done (cap obvious). People are like ‘oh well they’re not doing anything so why should I bother’. It really kills motivation. If you have concepts and an idea of what has to be done (which should be documented) then people won’t sit on their assess and do nothing.

If anyone is interested in taking the lead, go ahead. I’ll be there if you need models/textures.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman's Mind Episode 0
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
We did have a number of people interested in it a while back, we even had our own private forum that one of our members set up. But there were too many conflicting ideas and trying to manage and organise even a small project like that was quite difficult. If managing a small community remake of a training course level was hard, imagine remaking an entire game.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman's Mind Episode 0
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

Hahaha awesome episode. Reminds me of that Hazard Course remake project we had going a while ago that died. Would anyone still be interested in reviving it when BM comes out?

I for one would like to see a mod of it for BM when it’s released. I wouldn’t be able to do it myself because I suck, but it shouldn’t be as hard as remaking the whole game!

Read full topic
